name: Project Blood Crystal
description:
*Made from scratch in 10 sleepless days for the 2019 Scream Jam.*

I've been searching for her. She's all I have left to care about. Nothing else matters anymore.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Action/Fire

RMB - Aim

Scroll Wheel - Switch Weapons

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Space - Defend

Gamepad is also supported in-game.
